trans-unit.source: Loads a string resource for the specified language from the specified module

seg-source.mrk: Loads a string resource for the specified language from the specified module

target.mrk: Loads a string resource for the specified language from the specified module

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: A handle to an instance of the module whose executable file contains the string resource.

seg-source.mrk: A handle to an instance of the module whose executable file contains the string resource.

target.mrk: A handle to an instance of the module whose executable file contains the string resource.

trans-unit.source: Also, this parameter can specify the name of the module to load, it must be a full or relative path.

seg-source.mrk: Also, this parameter can specify the name of the module to load, it must be a full or relative path.

target.mrk: Also, this parameter can specify the name of the module to load, it must be a full or relative path.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is 0 or an empty string, that is equivalent to passing in a handle to the module

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is 0 or an empty string, that is equivalent to passing in a handle to the module

target.mrk: If this parameter is 0 or an empty string, that is equivalent to passing in a handle to the module

trans-unit.source: used to create the current process.

seg-source.mrk: used to create the current process.

target.mrk: used to create the current process.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the string to be loaded.

seg-source.mrk: The identifier of the string to be loaded.

target.mrk: The identifier of the string to be loaded.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The language identifier of the string resource of interest. To retrieve string for user default

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The language identifier of the string resource of interest.
To retrieve string for user default

target.mrk: [optional]
The language identifier of the string resource of interest.
To retrieve string for user default

seg-source.mrk: language set this parameter to $LOCALE_USER_DEFAULT (Default).

target.mrk: language set this parameter to $LOCALE_USER_DEFAULT (Default).

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: The string.

target.mrk: The string.

trans-unit.source: Empty string and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: Empty string and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: Empty string and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: Example

seg-source.mrk: \Extras\Resources.dll

target.mrk: \Extras\Resources.dll

target.mrk: Error

seg-source.mrk: \Extras\Resources.dll not found.

target.mrk: \Extras\Resources.dll not found.

trans-unit.source: Why is the resource name for the string with ID = 6000 is 376? 6000 / 16 + 1 = 376

seg-source.mrk: Why is the resource name for the string with ID = 6000 is 376?

target.mrk: Why is the resource name for the string with ID = 6000 is 376?
